text: Vítor Hugo Ribeiro Costa, known as Vítor Hugo (born 4 November 1985) is a Portuguese football player who plays for AD Oliveirense. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Desportivo das Aves on 7 January 2010 in a game against Santa Clara. ==References== ==External links== Category:1985 births Category:People from Vila Nova de Famalicão Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:G.D. title: Vítor Hugo (footballer, born 1985)
